raw_comment:
In the graph the higher the the higher the income rate the higher your estimated boost will be. 
  I wonder why it matters whether you're rich or poor because it should depend on your test scores and stuff like that. 
This can relate to the community because it can affect the people who don’t have as much money to get into a good college.
“Learn about your admission advantages at high end colleges”
ace_sentences: The graph shows a relation between income rate and estimated boost.
If the income rate is higher then the estimated boost is higher.
I wonder why it matters whether a person is rich or poor.
I think that admission should depend on test scores.
This issue relates to the community.
This issue can affect people who do not have much money.
If a person does not have much money then the person may not get into a good college.
The headline is: Learn about your admission advantages at high end colleges.
